1.content: Enhanced Volunteer Portal - Database Schema Design
1.details:
Create new database tables and enhance existing ones:
- volunteer_opportunities table (id, title, description, date, duration_hours, location, max_volunteers, current_volunteers, required_skills, status, admin_id)
- volunteer_signups table (id, opportunity_id, member_id, status, signed_up_at)
- Enhanced volunteer_hours table (link to opportunities and signups, approval_status, approved_by)
- Add approval workflows and capacity tracking

2.content: Member Volunteer Portal - Browse & Sign-up System
2.details:
Create enhanced member experience:
- Browse volunteer opportunities with filtering (date, location, skills, capacity)
- Opportunity detail pages with sign-up/withdraw functionality
- Personal volunteer dashboard showing signed-up opportunities
- Enhanced hour logging interface linked to specific opportunities
- Visual progress tracking toward 30-hour waiver goal
- Volunteer history and participation analytics

3.details:
Build comprehensive admin controls:
- Create/edit/delete volunteer opportunities
- Capacity management and waitlist functionality
- Approve/reject hour logs with approval tracking
- View all member sign-ups and participation
- Volunteer program analytics and reporting
- Enhanced membership management with volunteer tracking columns

4.details:
Implement complex business logic using Supabase Edge Functions:
- Opportunity capacity management with transaction safety
- Automatic hour-to-waiver calculation logic
- Hour approval workflow with notifications
- Real-time capacity updates and waitlist management
- Integration with existing membership waiver system
- Volunteer opportunity scheduling and conflict detection

5.details:
Create polished volunteer portal interface:
- Modern opportunity cards with filtering and search
- Interactive volunteer sign-up flow
- Dashboard widgets for volunteer progress
- Mobile-responsive design matching site theme
- Real-time updates for capacity and availability
- Integration with existing green branding and mosque styling

6.details:
Comprehensive testing and production deployment:
- Test all volunteer workflows (browse, sign-up, hour logging, approval)
- Verify integration with existing membership and waiver systems
- Test admin controls and capacity management
- Mobile and desktop compatibility testing
- Performance testing with concurrent volunteer activities
- Final deployment and user acceptance testing
